title: Best of ASTRO India Annual Meeting 2018

desc.desc:
Best of ASTRO India Annual Meeting 2018 is organized by Association of Radiation Oncologists of India, West Bengal Chapter (AROIWB) and will be held from Jun 29 - 30, 2019 at Taj Bengal Kolkata, Kolkata, West Bengal, India.

Target Audience:
This live activity is designed to meet the interests of radiation oncologists, medical oncologists, surgeons, physicists, nurses, diagnostic radiologists, pathologists, radiation therapists, radiation dosimetrists and radiation oncology residents.

Description:
The Best of ASTRO India meeting is an officially licensed two-day summary of the most relevant, highly-rated abstracts from the Annual Meeting of ASTRO, that highlight recent technological advances and illustrate the importance of the clinical and non-clinical skills needed to provide patients with the full benefit of radiation oncology.

Statement of need:
There are numerous advances in patient safety in the context of radiation therapy delivery, clinical research on treatment options and advanced techniques in radiotherapy delivery. Failure to stay up-to-date can result in lower quality of care by practicing clinicians. Given the time and breadth of knowledge required to stay up-to-date on advances in cancer therapy, in radiotherapy but also its combination with other treatment modalities, it can be very difficult for a busy practitioner to be knowledgeable about all high-impact new advances and its relevant literature affecting their practice.

Program Objectives
Upon completion of this live activity, attendees should be able to:
• Describe the most current data guiding cancer management decisions.
• Utilize modern radiation technology to improve patient care.
• Implement quality and safety measures in the delivery of radiation therapy.

Additional details will be posted as soon as they are available.

title: Certificate Program - Insulin Management in Type-2 Diabetes, Chennai

desc.desc:
Certificate Program - Insulin Management in Type-2 Diabetes, Chennai is organized by Medvarsity Online Limited and will be held on Jun 30, 2019 at Fortune Select Grand, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India.

About Workshop:
Insulin therapy is a key factor in treating patients with type 2 diabetes and maintaining their blood sugar levels. It is therefore crucial that medical practitioners that attend to diabetics are well equipped and trained in insulin management to provide optimum care.

Assimilate, along with Medvarsity, is conducting a unique one-day interactive workshop, specially designed to tackle everyday issues, concerns, and problem-solving when treating insulin-dependent patients. The participants will get to learn a pragmatic approach to insulin management through group exercises, case discussions, and didactic presentation.

Who Should Attend:
• Practicing Physicians in Internal Medicine/General Medicine/Family Medicine Disciplines and Postgraduate Residents of the same
• Practicing Clinicians from other specialties (Surgery, Pediatrics, Obstetrics, etc.)
• Practicing MBBS doctors who manage diabetic patients every day
• General Practitioners and Resident Doctors

Workshop Objectives:
• Gain a broader understanding of insulin management
• Possess a new set of tools in insulin management
• Gain knowledge in managing patients on various insulin regimens
• Tackle the common complications & special scenarios in insulin-dependent patients

Additional details will be posted as soon as they are available.

SIMSCON '19 - 11th South Indian Medical Students' Conference is organized by Sri Manakula Vinayagar Medical College and Hospital (SMVMCH) and will be held from Jul 04 - 06, 2019 at Puducherry, Pondicherry, India.

Why simscon?
Arguably one of the best medical conferences in all of South India, our history of conducting the event in a successful and glorious manner in the past 10 years speaks for the legacy SIMSCON holds.
With TNMC credit points available for postgraduates along with exciting and numerous conference events like medical dumb charades, medical spell master, quiz, moot court and much more, it will surely be an enjoyable and memorable experience for those attending.
SIMSCON also serves as a great platform to socialize with fellow medical students from all over the nation. 
World class speakers, the best of amenities, scrumptious food coupled with serene beaches and beauty of the French colony, Puducherry. SIMSCON is sure to be the conference of your lifetime and will definitely be worth your time and money.

Description:
SIMSCON provides an interactive platform for students so that they get an opportunity to learn, share and nurture their research skills and also to update themselves on the recent advancements in the medical field. SIMSCON’19 focuses exclusively on Ethics in Medical Practice and Research. We have speakers from different parts of the country addressing the theme. 

Additional details will be posted as soon as they are available.                                
                                                                
                                  
                                                                                                             
                                        Conference Details

2nd National Conference on Cardiopulmonary Rehabilitation is organized by Cardiac Wellness Institute and will be held from Jul 13 - 14, 2019 at Hotel Green Park, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India.

Dear Colleagues,
With the rapid rise in the incidence of cardiovascular and chronic pulmonary diseases in India and with more and more people grappling with disease complications, comprehensive cardiopulmonary rehabilitation is the need of the hour.

As doctors, physiotherapists, nutritionists, psychologists and nurses come together as a team to reduce death and disability due to heart and lung diseases, this conference aims to be a multidisciplinary scientific platform for all interested healthcare professionals to update skills, share knowledge and advance this field of medicine.

Theme: Multidisciplinary approach to prevention and rehabilitation of cardiovascular and chronic lung diseases

Target Audience:
• Practicingprofessionals&UG/PGstudents of
• Medicine/Cardiology
• Psychology 
• Physiotherapy
• SocialWork 
• Nutrtion&Dietetics 
• Nursing

Additional details will be posted as soon as they are available.

title: A Preparation Course for Examinations in General Surgery 2019

desc.desc:
A Preparation Course for Examinations in General Surgery is organized by The Royal College of Surgeons of Edinburgh (RCSEd) and will be held from Jul 16 - 18, 2019 at MIOT International, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. This CME Conference has been approved for a maximum of 18 CPD Points.

Target Audience:
The course is ideal for those appearing for the examination in 4 to 6 weeks although some may benefit from doing the course a few months before the intended examination date.

Overview:
This course is suitable for those taking examinations in General Surgery, or other Postgraduate surgical examinations such as MS, DNB, MD FCPS and JSCFE. The course is ideal for those appearing for the examination in 4 to 6 weeks although some may benefit from doing the course a few months before the intended examination date.

Aims & Objectives:
To prepare candidates taking post-graduate Examinations in General Surgery

Learning Outcomes:
On completion of this course the candidate will be able to:
• Describe the techniques required to pass the oral and clinical parts of Section 2 of the exam. 
• Will be able to present and discuss clinical cases as in examination situations.

Additional details will be posted as soon as they are available.

title: National Child Psychiatry CME 2019 by MGER

desc.desc:
National Child Psychiatry CME 2019 is organized by Medisquire Global Education Resources (MGER) and will be held on Jul 21, 2019 at Pride Plaza Hotel Aerocity, New Delhi, Aerocity, Delhi, India.

Description:
It gives us immense pleasure in inviting you to the third edition of the NCPC2019, an annual event of IAPP calendar, which is eagerly awaited upon. This year the CME is dedicated towards “AUTISM SPECTRUM DISORDERS”.

As the interest in child and adolescent psychiatry is increasing in the nation so is the need to acquire skills. We at IAPP realize that the backbone of delivering mental health in our nation is the stand alone practitioner. Hence the aim of this CME is to empower a clinic based private practitioner. The scientific program of the CME is entirely devoted towards enhancing the skill and resource base of the practitioner.

The venue for the CME, Pride Plaza Hotel, Aerocity, New Delhi, has been chosen, keeping in mind the ease of travel and national connectivity.   

The CME is a one day event scheduled for 21st July 2019, and we shall provide you the best that we can squeeze in a day.

We invite you all to attend the CME and encourage us to improve and deliver better.

Additional details will be posted as soon as they are available.

title: World Congress & Summit on Surgery by Asfew Conference String

desc.desc:
World Congress & Summit on Surgery is organized by Asfew Conference String and will be held from Aug 03 - 04, 2019 at New Delhi, Delhi, India.

Target Audience:
• Doctors 
• Surgeons
• Anaesthesiologists
• Medical Professionals
• Residents
• Fellowship holders
• Medical Students
• Nurses
• Surgical tool technicians
• Pharmaceutical Industries

Theme: Surgical Practices, research, Innovation & Exploring perspective in the field of Surgery.

Conference Sessions:
General Surgery and its Specialties: Otorhinolaryngology Surgery, Ophthalmic Surgery, Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery, Endocrine Surgery, Cardiothoracic Surgery, Transplantation Surgery, Gynaecological Surgery, Urology Surgery, Perioperative Surgery, Acute Care Surgery, Neuro-Surgery, Plastic Surgery, Orthopaedic Surgery, Advancement in Surgery, Surgeons, and Physicians Surgical Nursing.





Additional details will be posted as soon as they are available.

Ophthall 2019, Is the second Edition of Indias Only Practice Development Conference for Eye Hospitals and Eye Care Industry.

The event would be held on Aug 3rd and 4th at Hitex Convention Center Hyderabad India and would be attended by more than 1000 Eye Hospitals.

35 Excellent Speakers would cover all aspects of Ophthalmology Practice Management in the meet

16 Round Tables which would cover specific Management topics in Ophthalmology would be the highlight of the meet

Ophthall 2019 Conference Sessions will be focussed on the four categories
• Nuts and Bolts sessions cover the basics of what you need to know to manage the day-to-day operations of your practice.
• Strategy sessions take a higher-level view for practice owners planning growth and positioning
• On the Horizon sessions give you the information you need to prepare for new industry initiatives.
• Tips and Tricks sessions would reveal the trade secrets in Ophthalmology on simple but essential practice management topics.
Topics Overview
• Practice Management Nuts and Bolts Session
○ Emotional Intelligence for Ophthalmologists- Key Note Session.
○ Unlock your Clinics full potential with The Lean Practice Methodology
○ Developing a Culture of Excellence in your Practice- Panel Discussion
○ Bring in the wow factor in your patients Journey!
○ Future of Ophthalmic Practice- A culture of Collaboration- Panel Discussion

• Practice Management Strategy Session
○ Creating an Efficient Eye Clinic Design.
○ Value your Practice- Current Investment Trends in Ophthalmology.
○ Common Problems faced by Ophthalmology Practices and their Solutions- Panel Discussion
○ Maximise your Lasik and Premium IOL conversions.
○ Managing your Optical Shop Effectively.

• On the Horizon Session
○ Brand Yourself- Key Note Session
○ Marketing your Practice.
○ Managing Patient flows.
○ Insurance and Accreditation.

• Practice Management Pearls Session
○ Evaluating and implementing a new Technology in your practice.
○ It’s your call- Handling Patient calls effectively.
○ Incentives, Rewards, Salary Hike? How to best motivate your staff?
○ Innovating the Patient Experience -5 Ways to create Patient Loyalty
○ How to increase Patient foot Falls?- Panel Discussion
○ Preventing Lost Revenue- Where and How?
○ What is the right Price for your procedures, packages?

Tickets:
International Delegate Early Fee - 175 USD
International Delegate Onsite Fee - 300 USD
